speaker: Wilhelmina
message: Rhae...

speaker: Rhae
message: [i](This can't happen)[/i]

speaker: Wilhelmina
message: Rhae...?

speaker: Rhae
message: [i](How can one person be so supremely unloveable?)[/i]

speaker: Wilhelmina
message: Rhae!

speaker: Rhae
message: Huh, what, sorry... I'm here, I'm here!

speaker: Chessa
message: Are you alright? You've seen out of it all day you've barely told us about your date.

speaker: Rhae
message: [i](He said my feet are of such purity that he doesn't mind their lack of webbing...)[/i]

speaker: Rhae
message: Well a Lady must keep some secrets right?

speaker: Chessa
message: Not at tea time, no ma'am! We're here for polite discussion and now I must insist it's your turn.

speaker: Rhae
message: Well, if I must:
prompts: You don't happen to like feet do you?
Are you familiar with the concept of Human Chess?
How do you feel about waxing poetic about the moon?

responses.speaker: Chessa
responses.message: Well I do enjoy the arts but I can't say I'm familiar with... dressage? I'm more fond of the ethereal than the corporeal. [i]sigh[/i] I certainly do hope my Prince comes to me and sweeps me away.

responses.speaker: Chessa
responses.message: I am not sure I follow? I certainly like [i]having[/i] feet I suppose. [i]sigh[/i] I certainly do hope my Prince comes to me and sweeps me away.

responses.speaker: Chessa
responses.message: Games are for children Rhae, I don't have time for such juvenile activities. [i]sigh[/i] I certainly do hope my Prince comes to me and sweeps me away.

responses.speaker: Chessa
responses.message: Darling, talking at the moon is my favorite hobby. My dream is to be found on a [b]clear evening in a meadow reciting my poetry and waiting for my Prince Charming to come and steal me away.[/b]

speaker: Sienna
message: Goodness, I knew you were a romantic, Chessa, but that naivety borders on sickening.

speaker: Chessa
message: Oh and I am sure you have it all figured?

speaker: Sienna
message: More so than you dear, but this isn't about me. Come now, Rhae, I'm sure you have more to discuss?

speaker: Rhae
message: I guess...
prompts: I mean, like, how into feet are you?
In Human Chess, you can murder a man.
Do you feel as if you have no agency in this life we lead?

responses.speaker: Sienna
responses.message: Rhae I can always appreciate a finely tuned craft but honestly I sense nothing in that description that interests me. I personally look forward to meeting my Prince on the Battlefield of love! To think, the day is so close...

responses.speaker: Sienna
responses.message: As a Mantis I have little in the way of “feet”, so I've not put much thought into it. That's a strange question. I personally look forward to meeting my Prince on the Battlefield of love! To think, the day is so close...

responses.speaker: Sienna
responses.message: Kill a man, you say? Huzzah! Now that sounds like a game worth playing! I can see it now: [b]the Prince finding me in the castle and together we lock into a battle of might to cement our love.[/b]

responses.speaker: Sienna
responses.message: I am in control of my own life and no one else. I will take control of my life and meet my Prince on the battlefield of love where we will prove who is the dominant.

speaker: Chessa
message: Is that supposed to be romantic?

speaker: Sienna
message: Oh that's enough from you, not everyone has to like the same things when it comes to love.

speaker: Wilhelmina
message: Very true… but I want more [i]gossip![/i] What else do you have MC?

speaker: Rhae
message: [i](Would it just be easier to kill him? Would that really be that bad?)[/i]

speaker: Wilhelmina
message: Rhae! Your mind wanders again!!

speaker: Rhae
message: Ah! My apologies, much to ruminate on of late...
prompts: Did you know there's a horse cotillion??
This guy's a toe-sucker for sure. You into that?
He shot his man from 10 paces... is that even something to brag about?
Do you find yourself staring into the void?

responses.speaker: Wilhelmina
responses.message: Do [i]I[/i] know about Horse Cotillion? I was voted most eligible bachelorette when I graduated! I have dreamt of the day where [b]I meet my love in the stables. There he takes my hand and we share a dance and proclaim our love.[/b] To not guess as much you [i]really[/i] must be tired. Maybe you should turn in for the day…

responses.speaker: Wilhelmina
responses.message: I… well, technically the whole lower half of my leg would be considered the "toe" so I don't even know if that's possible? Rhae... Maybe its time to turn it in for the day? In the meantime I am going to continue practicing for my big moment where my love is realized.

responses.speaker: Wilhelmina
responses.message: In a world of anthropomorphic animals such as ours, "paces" seems like a horrible choice to denote distance. You really are exhausted, huh? Maybe it's time to call it a day? In the meantime I am going to continue practicing for my big moment where my love is realized.

responses.speaker: Wilhelmina
responses.message: Oh sweetie, you really are exhausted huh? Maybe it's time to call it a day? In the meantime I am going to continue practicing for my big moment where my love is realized.

speaker: Rhae
message: The horse is right. I'm turning in for the night.

speaker: Rhae
message: Next we all meet it'll be at one our weddings! [i](Hopefully one of [b]yours.[/b])[/i] I will miss these parties, though. Ta-ta!

speaker: Sienna
message: ...I'm sure she's fine.
